item.description:
Ok we finally have some better details about this event. I'm just going to make a list of the details.
the event charges $2 admission for the event in the morning and $4 if you go later in the day.
we will all try to meet at the front of the building to the elks lodge if that's not possible and i have to find a new spot please call me when you get there if no one is there (508-353-9900) and i will tell you where we moved to.
balloon lift off is at 6am but some of the most interesting pictures are during setup so be sure your there on time we plan on heading in right at 5 and time goes quick with this type of event.
afterwards I don't believe there is a whole lot going on until 2pm so after they all take off maybe we can go to group breakfast at this place i know down the st and decide where the rest of the day will take us.
if anyone has any questions please feel free to call or email me I'm available from 9am-12am every day
item.name: Balloon Festival, Hudson MA
